snippet: President George W. Bush’s team has decided to link arms with former intelligence officials against a long-awaited Senate report condemning torture by the Central Intelligence Agency.
abstract: Former Pres George W Bush, in interview, indicates solidarity with former intelligence officials ahead of long-awaited Senate report condemning torture by Central Intelligence Agency; report is said to assert that the CIA misled Bush and his White House about the nature, extent and results of brutal techniques like waterboarding.
lead_paragraph: President George W. Bush’s team has decided to link arms with former intelligence officials against a long-awaited Senate report condemning torture by the Central Intelligence Agency.

headline.main: Bush and C.I.A. Ex-Officials Rebut Torture Report
headline.print_headline: Bush and C.I.A. Ex-Officials Rebut Torture Report
